snippet.title: Turbo Overkill | Console Launch Trailer | Out Now!
snippet.description:
Soundtrack Available Now! ► https://materia.to/TurboOverkillPR
Turbo Overkill unleashes its high-octane, cyberpunk action onto consoles for the first time, arriving on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5|4, and Xbox Series X|S. Acclaimed for its relentless speed and stylish combat, this boomer shooter from Apogee Entertainment and Trigger Happy Interactive has earned a Metacritic score of 87 and over 5,000 overwhelmingly positive Steam reviews.

As Johnny Turbo, dive into the neon-soaked chaos of Paradise, a city overtaken by Syn—a rogue AI—and its army of cybernetic minions. With fluid gameplay at 60 FPS on advanced consoles, every chainsaw slide, shotgun blast, and explosive takedown is an adrenaline-fueled thrill.

Unleash a devastating arsenal of over ten weapons, each with unique alt-fires—like the explosive Twincendiary and pinpoint Ion Cannon. Use advanced traversal skills like wall-running, triple jumps, and a grappling hook to dominate sprawling urban hellscapes, while Johnny’s signature chainsaw leg adds a brutal touch to close combat.

Complementing the carnage is Turbo Overkill’s Soundtrack Selections album, a 73-track, 3+ hour collection blending cyberpunk synths, heavy metal riffs, and cinematic arrangements. Composed by Chipper Hammond, Nikola Jeremic (Cyberpunk 2077, Destiny 2), and Tim Stoney (Star Wars: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Assassin’s Creed: Origins), this curated album delivers an electrifying audio experience. For superfans, the Episode 1 Complete Score offers over 90 minutes of music, featuring every cue from Episode 1 plus bonus tracks. Albums for Episodes 2 and 3 will follow in the coming weeks.

The soundtrack, produced by Apogee’s Executive Producer Jeron Moore (3D Realms’ Prey, The Legend of Zelda: Symphony of the Goddesses, Pokémon: Symphonic Evolutions), is available now on all major platforms through Apogee Music in partnership with Materia Collective.

-
DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
X / TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
THREADS: ► https://threads.net/apogeeentertainment
BLUESKY: ►https://bsky.app/profile/apogeeent.com
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEntertainment
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

Directed & Produced by Jeron Moore
Edited by Simon Macas
Trailer Footage Capture & Support by Black Sheep Studios
The Voice of Syn & Ripper: Patricia Summersett
The Voice of S.A.M.M.: Jon St. John
The Voice of Maw: Gianni Matragrano
The Voice of The EXEC: D.B. Cooper
Using Themes from “Turbo Overkill” by Nikola Jeremic, Chipper Hammond, and Tim Stoney
Trailer Music Composer: Mathieu Hallouin
VO Engineering: Sam Ferrara
Executive Producer: Jeron Moore
Special Thanks: Sam Prebble, Devon Johnson, Steven Blackburn & Scott Miller
